019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.nio.file.Files;
023import java.nio.file.Path;
024import java.util.Objects;
025import java.util.Optional;
026import java.util.logging.Level;
027import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_LOGIN;
028import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD;
029import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.DATA_DISPLAY_USER;
030import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY;
031import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpSetDisplayPassword;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpSetPasswordExpiry;
033import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ConfigureQemu;
034import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
035import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.RunState;
036import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
037import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
038import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
039import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
040import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
041
042/**
043 * The Class DisplayController.
044 */
045@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
046public class DisplayController extends Component {
047
048    private String currentPassword;
049    private String protocol;
050    private final Path configDir;
051
052    /**
053     * Instantiates a new Display controller.
054     *
055     * @param componentChannel the component channel
056     * @param configDir 
057     */
058    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic",
059        "PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod" })
060    public DisplayController(Channel componentChannel, Path configDir) {
061        super(componentChannel);
062        this.configDir = configDir;
063        fire(new WatchFile(configDir.resolve(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD)));
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * On configure qemu.
068     *
069     * @param event the event
070     */
071    @Handler
072    public void onConfigureQemu(ConfigureQemu event) {
073        if (event.runState() == RunState.TERMINATING) {
074            return;
075        }
076        protocol
077            = event.configuration().vm.display.spice != null ? "spice" : null;
078        updatePassword();
079    }
080
081    /**
082     * Watch for changes of the password file.
083     *
084     * @param event the event
085     */
086    @Handler
087    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
088    public void onFileChanged(FileChanged event) {
089        if (event.path().equals(configDir.resolve(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD))) {
090            updatePassword();
091        }
092    }
093
094    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
095    private void updatePassword() {
096        if (protocol == null) {
097            return;
098        }
099        if (setDisplayPassword()) {
100            setPasswordExpiry();
101        }
102    }
103
104    private boolean setDisplayPassword() {
105        return readFromFile(DATA_DISPLAY_PASSWORD).map(password -> {
106            if (Objects.equals(this.currentPassword, password)) {
107                return true;
108            }
109            this.currentPassword = password;
110            logger.fine(() -> "Updating display password");
111            fire(new MonitorCommand(
112                new QmpSetDisplayPassword(protocol, password)));
113            return true;
114        }).orElse(false);
115    }
116
117    private void setPasswordExpiry() {
118        readFromFile(DATA_PASSWORD_EXPIRY).ifPresent(expiry -> {
119            logger.fine(() -> "Updating expiry time to " + expiry);
120            fire(
121                new MonitorCommand(new QmpSetPasswordExpiry(protocol, expiry)));
122        });
123    }
124
125    private Optional<String> readFromFile(String dataItem) {
126        Path path = configDir.resolve(dataItem);
127        String label = dataItem.replace('-', ' ');
128        if (path.toFile().canRead()) {
129            logger.finer(() -> "Found display user");
130            try {
131                return Optional.ofNullable(Files.readString(path));
132            } catch (IOException e) {
133                logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> "Cannot read " + label + ": "
134                    + e.getMessage());
135                return Optional.empty();
136            }
137        } else {
138            logger.finer(() -> "No " + label);
139            return Optional.empty();
140        }
141    }
142}
